name: Knight Finley

topics.response_text: This is Galaxy News Radio, the last free voice of the people of the Wasteland. The Brotherhood of Steel makes sure of that.
Knight Finley at your service. What can I do for you?

conversation.response_text: Hehe. You'll get your chance, brother. Be patient.
If you'd rather run around out there with all those Super Mutants, be my guest.
Don't worry brother, we'll see plenty of action here, I can promise you that.
Yes, sir. I am locked and loaded.
I always do, sir. Is there something we should be expecting?
Drop back in anytime, pal. We could use the company!

description:
Knight Finley is a 28 year-old Caucasian Male.

Knight Finley is a dedicated member of the Brotherhood of Steel, tasked with defending the GNR building plaza alongside Knight Dillon and Knight Sergeant Wilks. Clad in distinctive power armor with the Brotherhood's red and black colors, he presents an imposing figure to outsiders. Despite his haughty demeanor typical of Brotherhood members, Finley possesses a strong moral compass and will aid those in genuine need, particularly when it comes to combating the super mutant threat that plagues the Capital Wasteland.

Knight Finley's Personality: Finley exhibits the classic Brotherhood of Steel arrogance, looking down on wastelanders whom he considers unrefined and technologically illiterate. However, beneath this haughty exterior lies a passionate hatred for super mutants and a strong sense of duty. He is disciplined, loyal to the Brotherhood's mission, and takes his guarding responsibilities very seriously. While not openly friendly, he can be persuaded to offer assistance or information to those who show respect for the Brotherhood and demonstrate competence against common threats.

Knight Finley's Backstory: Born and raised in the Capital Wasteland, Finley was recruited into the Brotherhood of Steel as a squire at a young age after demonstrating both combat aptitude and a technical aptitude. He proved himself during numerous patrols against raider groups and super mutant attacks, eventually earning his knighthood through acts of bravery and dedication to the Brotherhood's cause. Finley has served under Elder Lyons for several years, having been assigned to the GNR building detail to help secure this vital communication hub for the Brotherhood's operations in the wasteland.
